meanings.definition: The state or quality of being intoxicated or drunk.
meanings.sent1: After a night of heavy drinking, his inebriety was evident to everyone around him.
meanings.sent2: The inebriety of the man caused concern among his friends.
meanings.sent3: His inebriety led to some hilarious dance moves at the party.
meanings.sent4: The inebriety of the situation was like a fog clouding his judgment.
meanings.sent5: The inebriety of the moment was a stark reminder of the dangers of excessive drinking.

meanings.sent1: Her inebriety had become a constant source of worry for her family.
meanings.sent2: The inebriety of the man was a daily struggle for him.
meanings.sent3: Despite his inebriety, he always managed to show up for work on time.
meanings.sent4: The inebriety of his lifestyle was like a heavy weight dragging him down.
meanings.sent5: The inebriety of his actions painted a clear picture of his addiction.
